website_summaries.verdict: An affordably priced phone case that offers excellent protection for an iPhone 6.
pros: A good value for the money, users praise this case for standing up well to drops and falls, giving outstanding protection in a lightweight design
cons: A few feel the case design is too slippery, making it easier to drop the phone
Some minor problems with the fit and screen cover

customer_reviews.title: ... my new iPhone came in and omg did this poor case take a beating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for when my new iPhone came in and omg did this poor case take a beating. I've accidentally thrown my phone 6 feet, its dropped down the stairs, fell off my counter onto tile, and my phone is STILL SAFE, NEVER CRACKED! EDIT:::: I've had this case for well over a year now and it JUST got its first crack. I've put this case through hell and it's only now starting to get worn down. I still highly recommend this case to anyway looking for a slim, protective case for their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Evette G.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME PROTECTION
customer_reviews.text: I'm super clumsy. I used to only purchase lifeproof but I could never hear anything people were saying so I switched but I was hesitant. This has SURPASSED my expectations. I have dropped my phone multiple times in the parking lot and sidewalk and on tile and my phone is perfectly protected. I work in an environment where my phone is constantly in danger of being cracked and so far so good. No issues. I waited to write my review so I can write from experience. It is light weight and I can hear people and they can hear me! The color was adorable and it's slim! Fits right in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: mPastor

customer_reviews.title: I love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I got the Aqua Sky color, and it is beautiful. The colors are the same as in the photo. I have an iPhone 6S, and it fits really well on my phone. I saw some other reviews saying that it didn't fit properly. However, mine fits nicely on my phone. It just took a little bit of maneuvering to get it to fit properly. So far, I've only dropped my phone once, and the case held up just fine. For me, this was a great purchase. If I needed another case, I would likely purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: McKenna P.

customer_reviews.title: Easily cracks- happened while removing for cleaning
customer_reviews.text: My first impressions of this case, 6 months ago, were great. I loved the color and it seemed to fit well. However, time has shown me that the quality of this case is far less than I thought it was. The hard outer case portion cracked at the base while I was removing it to clean. I didn’t drop it, wasn’t using excessive force etc. The crack eventually lead to the entire bottom corner cracking and chipping off. I am severely disappointed as I can’t imagine that it would have protected my phone much if it had landed on its corner. Do yourself a favor and purchase a different case.
customer_reviews.author: SZappone

customer_reviews.title: This Case is Exactly What I Expected and I’m Happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This Case is Exactly What I Expected and I’m Happy with it. I had to move the rubber around a little to get the plastic outer casing to fit snuggly against the phone but once it was lined up right it’s a great deal for the price - definitely will provide solid protection for the price. Colors nice, orders the blueish/aqua one. Had a glass protective screen on the front tha didn’t go to the edges of the phone as this case fits around the edges slightly so lined up perfectly and provides full coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case good, screensaver not.
customer_reviews.text: Good case, easy to put on the phone. The screensaver, however, is a flimsy piece of thin plastic. It doesn't fit within the case to stay snug under the overlap of the case, just applies to the front of your phone. Not as hardy as the previous Otterbox screensaver I had. Company sent me a new screensaver, but it was also flimsy. Not recommended if you are hard on your phone.
customer_reviews.author: LaGrandeBaker

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't find anything comparable
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a month now. Still looks new. I am a very messy phone owner, and with this being my first smartphone, I was incredibly nervous. I chose this for the double case and especially the port covers. Mine did come with a screen cover, appeared plastic, but I had already purchased a tempered glass screen protector. Easy on and off, when I want.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL M

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Popular Case
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for a few months now and since I bought it, it has successfully protected my phone from multiple falls. I also use a screen protector (something I recommend everyone with an iPhone to get) ( I use the APEKX iPhone 6S / iPhone 6 Tempered Glass one). The material is smooth to the point where it's easy to take out of your pocket and doesn't fall out of your hand easily. The only annoyance I have is that everyone else seems to have this case in Blue and Light Blue. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Scales

customer_reviews.title: Great protection with slim profile
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I've had my case for about a year, and it's still working well. Dirt does get between the 2 pieces, but it is easy to take apart and clean. The color has faded, and there are some cracks and missing chunks from the hard plastic outer shell, but that's probably because I drop my phone so much. The inner rubber part has stretched a bit and is loose around my phone in places, but otherwise it is holding its shape well. I'm planning to use this case until I get a new phone -- it's been excellent at keeping my phone protected while also having a slim profile.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Vertina

customer_reviews.title: Love this case -
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for a year and still going strong. I just switched from a 6s to an 8 and am loathe to change my case. I've been looking for something comparable but so far still using this one. It even allows me to charge on a wireless charger. My 6s is in great shape. It does get a little dirty beneath the case, but I've dropped it several times and no cracks or damage. I will be looking for something similar for my daughters' SE phones as well. Very happy with this case! If anyone knows of a comparable case for my new 8, please share a link!
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Aqua Sky Commuter Series Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: I have an IPhone 6s. The fit is great. The colors are bright (not neon) which is what I wanted so I can more easily find it. It is sturdy but not super bulky like the heavier Otterbox version that snaps together. It came with a protector sheet for the front, but I used one from Mr. Shield for iphone 6s because I thought it did not come with one. The one it came with is thicker than the one I used. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: krisla

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.text: I had crossed my fingers that I wouldn't have the issues others experienced with the case not fitting but sure enough, the outter plastic part didn't fully fit around the case and left a gap at the top in between the plastic and rubber portion. Poor craftsmanship and certainly not worth the price. Decided to return it for a different case. Update - FYI....went to Best Buy and tried on their commuter and it fits perfectly. Not sure if Amazon stock is defective but give it a try at your local retailer. You will pay a little more but I figured it was worth it for a case that fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Blockhead77

customer_reviews.title: Love the color and how it really does protect my phone
customer_reviews.text: This case has been great, especially for the price. I am a mom on the go and I have broken the screens on a few phones, to be honest. So this time I bought this case and a glass screen protector. I have dropped my phone without any damaged to the screen. The case has a damaged spot in the corner but my phone is fine. I would definitely by another should I need it. Definitely great shock absorption
customer_reviews.author: H. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Just OK-Returned
customer_reviews.text: It's just that. OK. It isn't a perfect fit, a little loose around the corners but not so much that it will fall off. It might however affect the protection. I have always used a defender but I got tired of not really being able to use the full screen due to the extra front protection of the defender. I do find the case slippery although still more grippy than the phone itself. I will keep it for now because of the decent price but I will continue to shop for a better fit with more grip. Decided to return and replace with Defender through Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi (DeCoyAbLe)

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, good size!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. It's #1 in my book for protection. It's not as big as the original otter box that is a bit clunky - it's the perfect size. My phone still fits in my jeans pocket and such. After a while the ware and tare shows: it looks a little dirty and one of the sides of the otterbox got cracked - but overall, these are pretty unavoidable and it's a great case! Additionally, it's pretty easy to take on and take off. Some bigger/more protective cases I've used in the past have been difficult to take off and put on - but this one was a lot quicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is just a great product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second OtterBox Commuter Series case. Not that I needed a second one--because the first is still in excellent condition. I just wanted a little more color. Though I try not to drop my phone, it does happen. The case is still in great shape, but more importantly, my phone doesn't have a scratch--even though I don't use the screen protector. The relatively sleek styling makes it easy to slide in and out of my purse and pocket. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good case, very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It has kept my phone protected despite my many instances of dropping it. You cannot tell from the case itself that it has ever touched the ground. There are no scuff marks and it fits the phone well. I had another Otterbox for another older phone and it eventually started coming apart at the bottom of the case after some drops, but this one seems much improved.
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good protection but not the ultimate armor
customer_reviews.text: A good balance between bulk and protection, this is my third case of this model. I like the way it protects the phone, but each one breaks at the same place on the back from normal use. Inexpensive enough to replace it once in a while. As someone pretty careless with the phone, I have only broken the screen once, when I took a fall on top of the phone. I am not sure any case would have prevented the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Gardening Girl

customer_reviews.title: Not the right color!
customer_reviews.text: The color is NOT sky blue. It’s aqua, like some of the other otter defender cases. That bummed me out. Especially after seeing picture of other people’s cases in the review section that WERE the light blue. It also doesn’t fit the 6s like it does the 6. Had to ask my boyfriend to put it on and even he had to check if it would work after he tested it on his 6. It’s pretty and I’m a big Otterbox fan but I didn’t really get what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an otterbox for awhile and wanted something that was safe for my phone but also not to expensive. I saw this one and purchased it primarily because the price was great and I loved the color. I am one to drop my phone so many times and this case saved my every time. I didn't even need a screen protector because the case kept my phone so safe.
customer_reviews.author: allie p.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality and Durable without being bulky.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the teal colored phone case and it is true to color. Very cute case!very durable without being too bulky. It's a little work to put on, and feels very high quality. The only issue I notice is that the hard case doesn't fit 100% exactly over the rubber part of the case. I have an iPhone 6S. The port cover is easy to open and close. It doesn't interfere with the charger at all. I like this case so much that I ordered the same one in pink for my Grandmother's iPhone 7Plus. She LOVES it too! The color is easy for her to find in her purse. I highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for price
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for price. Only 4 stars due to a couple of spots near bottom of case where it is not a perfect seamless fit but I don't mind that so much as it is not a gaping hole just a small spot. The OtterBox 77-50719 fits model A1633 Iphone 6s. Dont mistakenly buy OtterBox 77-50715 Commuter Series Case for iPhone 6/6s for the A1633 model iphone 6s as it is too big.
customer_reviews.author: Deena C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: got it the other day and it fits perfectly, it also came with a screen protector but I bought a tempered glass one so I just have an extra one. I don't know why people are saying it doesn't fit lol hybrid cases you really have to work with when you put them on, they're made to fit snug so anywhere you see a gap between the rubber when the hard plastic you have to push it together and make it fit...it won't just go together Automatically. I give it 5 stars and I recommend to anyone who's looking to protect their phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Crowley

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and Inexpensive, the Perfect Combo
customer_reviews.text: Based on my experience with iPhone cases, this is the best in its price range. I wanted something fairly inexpensive with a reputable name, so I could be sure that my phone is protected. The OtterBox commuter series case does not disappoint. I've dropped my phone here and there, onto tile and concrete, and the case can handle all of the impact. I've had it for more than a year, and it is still holding up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Renee T.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Only complaint was the color. Was hoping for a darker blue than it was. Actual was lighter than image. In my experience buying 5-6 other cases from various companies, the color is typically darker than image. Functionally it works as described. Fit is tight so may be harder to get on than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting the color to be like what was in the picture and it was totally ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting the color to be like what was in the picture and it was totally different. On my part, I guess I should have read the fine print better as aqua could be tricky color but I was hoping (wishing) for the color on the display which, in my opinion, is more blue. Anyhow, other than that the case fit exactly and everything is working well. I'm keeping it as my other case broke but my feeling is about it - ehhh, it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a otterbox for wveryphone i have owned and evwryphone my husband has owned. Great product trust it with my electonics. This otter box i bought for my 9 year old sister well she's a kid and prefers character cases and sparkly things
customer_reviews.author: Cynra

customer_reviews.title: Previous Otterbox customer disappointed with design flaw
customer_reviews.text: I received this case yesterday. I noticed that the plastic screen protector does not cover the entire screen (for iPhone 6s), it was a little small. Also, there were significant gaps between the hard backing & rubber part of the case (like other reviewers noted). Such imprecision in the design does not make me feel very secure about the protection it will offer my phone, so I returned the case immediately. I previously had an Otterbox commuter for my iPhone 5, and it was great, so I am very disappointed with the design flaw for this Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone from dozens of drops.
customer_reviews.text: I drop my phone a lot, and so far this has protected it. It gets dirty and it's a little difficult to clean, and I've had some parts chipping, but it's been sturdy for the year I've had it. The screen cover was also too difficult to get on without getting dust all over it, so I had to throw that part away.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Chavey

customer_reviews.title: ... about 2 years now and it is still working great! Gives it amazing protection against my clumsy nature
customer_reviews.text: I've had this same case on my phone for about 2 years now and it is still working great! Gives it amazing protection against my clumsy nature; fits great. There is some wear on the bendy bits that cover the ports, but at 2 years, I think that's no problem. I'll be ordering again once this one dies, but I'm thinking it'll last another 6 months to a year or so. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Phone completley shattered
customer_reviews.text: I had my iPhone 6 for around a month and I was trying to find a good case for it and all the reviews said that this case was amazing and how that they had dropped their phone multiple times with no damage after a week of having the case it fell out of my bed and completely shattered it looked like fish scales through half of my phone I would recommend a defender instead of a commuter if you want your phone to be protected
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Bonfield

customer_reviews.title: Pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: Otter box is an alright company for budget level phone protection. Three years later the case is still useable. However some spots on its design are weaker than others as one of the joints by the charging port snapped and is now a touch irritating. The screen protector also shattered writhing the first six months where as the one I bought from the dollar store has lasted over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Heleni S.

customer_reviews.title: Slim, snug and color was true to the ad
customer_reviews.text: I adore the commuter series! Not to bulky and protects my phone from my many drops and bumps. This is not my first Otterbox commuter and it won’t be my last. The beautiful blue shade is true to the pictures listed. Slender and snug fit. I did however have the same issue as many others. The rubber case fit good but there were a few gaps between the plastic cover and the rubber cover. Only noticeable to me or anyone looking close. Would buy another would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Britt09

customer_reviews.title: Could fit better
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice color and potentially a good case. I had a problem other people have posted before where it doesn't fit the frame exactly. I asked for a replacement and received a case even worse than the one I had, didn't fit well at all. I returned that one and I'm just keeping the one I initially bought, it still has gaps at the bottom, top, and side. I guess I have to deal with the imperfect fit, but for $30 I had hoped for a well fitting case.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Case
customer_reviews.text: Great price! I paid 2 or 3 times this price when I bought this exact case 2 or 3 years ago, and the only reason I replaced it is that the rubbery part started getting a little too grungy. I’ve dropped this phone an embarrassing amount of times, and the case always saved it! And I love that it’s not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Not great if you are hard on your phone
customer_reviews.text: First, I am not easy on my phone and seek cases that will protect it from the frequent falls it incurs. If this is also your plight, DO NOT buy this case. Within two months of using this case I cracked my phone. Prior to this case I had a pelican case, which protected my phone for over a year. I did not realize how well the pelican case was protecting the phone until having the OtterBox. Visually this is not boxy and has a nice feel over all. Protection from cracks rates a 1/10.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable, attractive - the phone case!
customer_reviews.text: This case is made so well!! I love how sturdy it is and I have dropped my phone 3 times since buying this case, and it hasn't been damaged, at all. (I'm so bad with dropping my phone). Love the color and have received many compliments on the case. This is my first Otter Box but it won't be the last! Looking forward to buying a water proof case next.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Workout Chick

customer_reviews.title: For you phone droppers out there.
customer_reviews.text: Like many, I am a constant dropper. My phone is unfortunately dropped at least 5 times a day. I don't know that I can avoid dropping it because trust me, I've tried. Luckily, I have this phone case. It's cute, not bulky and it does what it's intended to. Eventually, this phone case will be beat up from my chronic dropping and when it's time has expired I will probably purchase a new one!
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: 1000 days of abuse & still going strong.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2.5 years ago, or approximately 1000 days ago. It is safe to say that I drop my phone at least once a day. I slam the child on the hard concrete. Often face down. Sometimes downstairs. Over 1000 cases of domestic violence against my phone. And, it has not broken. Hallelujah and amen.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon McB

customer_reviews.title: Thin, tough and a great protector!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite case so far! It has protected my phone through multiple drops. It is easy to put on and take off. I have a tempered glass cover on my phone and it does not interfere with this cover. I can easily wipe down this cover and it comes clean easily. I like that this phone case is thin and slides easily in and out of my pocket. I hope you like this as much as I do! I can easily recommend this iphone case.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Pretty iPhone OtterBox cover - great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully, I had an OtterBox for my last iPhone and it protected my phone for over 2 1/2 years. I dropped my phone numerous time onto the street, out my car window while I was parked on the side of the street, on a cement floor and a few other times as well. So, OtterBox is as good as it gets for protection purposes especially if you have kids or are clumsy with your phone.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Real Happy with this case!
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cell phones in my family and all of us use this case. I bought mine 1st, felt it was a well designed case and bought 3 more. For my wife and 2 daughters. I guessed at the colors they might like and all were totally happy with my decision. A rare occasion. This last one cost $6.15 with tax because it was offered as used/very good condition. Saved me 10 bucks and came in 2 days with Prime/free shipping. It looked brand new, just didn’t have the original packaging. I believe I got the upper hand on this one. Highly recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never had damage to phone
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one but I have little kiddos and I'm clumsy so it gets dropped A LOT. My phone has never been damaged in the falls. My old case cracked pretty bad so I purchased the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: I will ONLY buy Otter Box! I drop my ...
customer_reviews.text: I will ONLY buy Otter Box! I drop my phone all the time and have 2 kids.... it protects my phone awesome- has never cracked!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Whittig

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I got this case to replace a waterproof one. I liked the waterproof one, but it covered one of the light meters of the camera. The OtterBox protects my phone which I've dropped several times since purchasing the OtterBox, and I now get great pictures. I'd definitely recommend this case. My only wish is that this case would be waterproof, since iPhones are very prone to water damage.
customer_reviews.author: Riorita

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 6S just as expected. I did notice at first that it wasn’t fitting on right (just as some of the reviews said) but once I played with it a little bit, the hard case fit right into the soft case perfectly. I think you just have to mess with it to fit better since the material are two different textures.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: ... bought this for my iphone since I've had such terrible luck with the screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my iphone since I've had such terrible luck with the screen. I do like the case. The color is really nice and the outer shell does seem to protect the phone. The only thing I'm a little skeptical about is the screen protection itself. So far so good, I work outside so only time will tell if this hold up but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after less than 6 months! :(
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Relatively easy to put on and take off. Unlike my previous case, this one does not feel like it is going to bend my phone. Edited: changed my review from 5 to 2 stars. This case is broken in two spots already and is only 6 months old. It stays on my phone all the time except when I take it off to wipe the phone down to remove dust and fingerprints once a week. Very displeased with this, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hellga

customer_reviews.title: Give it a few days before deciding the case doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent case. I really like how they made the port covers thicker and more durable. I'm hoping the port covers will last an entire 2 years this time. I am very happy with this case so far and it seems more durable than the last OtterBox Commuter Series case that I had for my last iPhone. People had commented on the fit of this case and said that it didn't fit correctly. I cannot explain it but mine was the same way for the first week and all of the sudden the plastic fits correctly and it really does look like it's made for the phone.
customer_reviews.author: pups1911

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great case! All the buttons are useable/accessible. The commuter series work well with a glass screen protector and still fits snugly. There's no interference with calls (not hearing or not being heard). For the amount of protection it offers my phone it's not bulky. I'm now solely an otterbox user!
customer_reviews.author: lindylou

customer_reviews.title: Great for clumsy/accident-prone users!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product! My wife constantly drops her phone, but after 3 years of using this case, her phone is still in perfect condition (Even an Apple employee recently commented that he rarely sees phones this old in such good condition). The case had begun to crack a bit, though, so we bought this (the exact same model and color as her first one) to replace it. We've been very pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for IPhone 6. Very slimming
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits phone like a glove!! Its very slimming so it makes phone easy to fit in your back pocket or purse. I am a fan of the otter box covers. The last cover I purchased for his phone was not an otter box cover and didn't last very long. So for me no more phone covers unless they are otter box covers. Love the color of cover as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Forbes

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting this case forever but didn't want to spend over $50 on it, I was very pleased to find it for this price. I love it and its super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on phone
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on phone. It’s tightly. Lots of protection, my daughter dropped her phone in the parking lot—it didn’t break thankfully! My daughter is 14-she actually said it was stylish!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: It's a Joke
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it! There is something very wrong with these cases, or otter box is cheating us out. Their cases used to be great. The inside rubber picks up on the dye from your clothing, specifically dark jeans, I dropped the case once and the outer shell cracked by the camera, luckily Otter box replaces them, but its just getting annoying. On my second replacement in less than a month. this is a joke.
customer_reviews.author: Elou

customer_reviews.title: Protects phone, careful with your screen
customer_reviews.text: Protects the phone though Ian really careful with the screen being exposed. I also keep getting something under the darn screen protection sheet. I've redone it a few times and it still sticks but so does hair or dust. That's my fault though.
customer_reviews.author: PZ

customer_reviews.title: I am very disappointed with this phone case
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this phone case! I've never had an issue with otter box cases but this one is terrible! The rubber part of the case does not fit properly into the hard plastic shell. There are tons of gaps and I'm not sure it will do very good protecting a phone.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Many of the other reviews on this complained about how it didn't fit their phone well and that there were lots of gaps between the two pieces of the case - this was also true for me. I liked the colors and the slimness of the case, but the gaps just made it look awkward. I wondered if this was maybe a fake... If you want this case, I would try purchasing from the Otterbox website. I was able to return it for a full refund though so no harm done. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for my mother 4 years ago, and she still uses this phone and the case has held up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I've dropped my phone several times with NO damage to my phone with this case on!
customer_reviews.text: Okay confession time: I think I have dropped my phone more often than my two teenagers! This case protects your phone like you wouldn't believe! No problems opening the bottom to charge the phone, great sleek design!
customer_reviews.author: funincolorado

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like this as much as other cases
customer_reviews.text: This case protects the phone but I don't like how much gets the case between and the phone. This does not provide as much cover as other cases I have used. After over a year, all my buttons and pieces are still in tact and have not broken off but I am also not hard on phone cases.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Otterbox
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these otterbox for my son and daughters iPhone6 s and I have to say the packaging was wonderful and the fit of the case is perfect. Colors are as expected and we are very pleased thus far with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Inner & outer case doesn't quite fit correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with the color and the feel of this case. However, I am not sure if I ended up with a damaged product or not. The bottom of the outside case does not line up with the inner case. While I don't think it affects the integrity of the product, it is rather annoying that it gets caught on things in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Hippie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Love love love Otterbox cases
customer_reviews.text: This Commuter case still maintains the slimming look of the iPhone while still protecting the phone. Love love love Otterbox cases! There are flaps that go over the charging port and the headphone jack but are smart enough not to cover the microphone and speakers. The only thing I was not expecting was that the case is in two pieces and a bit difficult to put on at first but then I got the hang of it! The two pieces are the flexible part then the hard shell. Good product for decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Love the color. Screen protector went on very easily. It seems to protect very well while looking nice. This color was cheaper for some reason but I actually like it better than the one I originally wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I love Otterbox because it helps my phone to last since I drop my phone basically everyday.
customer_reviews.author: eazyel

customer_reviews.title: Phone cracked
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a Otterbox Defender for years and have dropped my phone plenty of times and the phone screen never cracked. I had this Otterbox Commuter case on my phone for not even 12 hours and it dropped a foot onto my bathroom counter and shattered my whole screen. Do not use the Commuter it is very sleek and slippery in my hand compared to the Defender. I will be going back to the Defender.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good, protective case
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good, protective case. For the amount of protection it gives to your phone, there is very little bulk. I love how this case looks and the colors are almost identical to the ones shown in the picture. The only reason I didn't give this product five stars is that, the outer hard shell part of the case doesn't fit perfectly with the rubbery part, but it is still functional and I really like this case.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Works well but note that case starts cracking and falling ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but note that case starts cracking and falling apart about a year in. I still stretched mine to last almost 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: I've had otterbox cases before and this one is probably my favorite design. This case feels sturdy and fits my phone perfectly. It took a couple days to adjust to the weight and thickness the case added to my phone, but now I don't even notice. I was also a bit apprehensive of the color when I placed my order, but I love it. Overall I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: They have been and excellent product. This particular case
customer_reviews.text: Have used Otter Box phone cases multiple times before. They have been and excellent product. This particular case, however, snapped in two when my son was removing the phone from the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amy R.

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating bubbles on screen
customer_reviews.text: The film that goes over the screen comes with a little sheet, with vague instructions to install. I ended up with a bunch of bubbles on my screen that looked really bad. Otterbox, please at least make better instructions for the screen sheet, or redesign it, so it does not end up with bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: BillNJ

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Held up really well! Wish all cases were made this well.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Kiser

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT THEY USED TO BE
customer_reviews.text: Surprised ! The case did not fit right at all. I have bought Otta Box for my other phones and while they are bulky they look great and protect real.well. This one was terrible. I actually looked to be sure it wasn't a knock off. Would not recommend at all!! I would return it but because I trusted them i cut the connection flaps off after installation and threw out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Case Bad Screen Protector
customer_reviews.text: The case is great. It fits my iPhone 6s perfectly, but the screen protector is awful. It's a thin, blue film that adheres to the screen. It's difficult to apply, and gives a bluish tint to the screen. I ended up chucking the screen protector and buying a different one, but I'm still using the actual case. The case is great, sturdy, and nice looking. I like it a lot, but the screen protector is nearly worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Lana GF

customer_reviews.title: Protects okay, but other annoyances aren't worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The case protects the phone well, but the little flaps for the charge and headphone ports are really annoying and always get in my way. You have to carefully hold them back when plugging anything in, so forget doing it in the car while your phone is in the hands free holder. Also, the case is getting really dirty very quickly, and visibly so. I won't buy one of these again.
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia K

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic case, however it gets dirty quickly and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic case, however it gets dirty quickly and it stays that way. I've tried to clean it, but it will not go back to it's original color or even close to it. I would repurchase it again, but I feel like that would be a waste of money because mine is perfectly fine in that it has no real damage other than the color. I've had the case for a year now and it only has a few scratches from when I have dropped it; it has protected my phone perfectly without being bulky like the defender series. Plus, the defender series has a plastic screen connected to the case and I prefer to use my own glass screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: Elda P

customer_reviews.title: Fits pretty well. Took a little while for it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits pretty well. Took a little while for it to stretch out. The plastic part and the rubber part still don't go together smoothly and you can see the gaps between the plastic and rubber parts easily. Wish that you didn't see any gaps that's why this is not a five star review. The color is great and exactly what I was wanting. It is a little lighter than the picture online, but still pretty close. Have already dropped phone once or twice and case has protected it well and did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: I have a tendency to drop my phone a lot and this case saved for me for any damaged. It lasted about 2 years before I got a different phone.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Givens

customer_reviews.title: Its the perfect case
customer_reviews.text: I first tried to use a knock-off version of this case but I had to remove the case everytime I tried to use a non-iphone charger. This case is perfect! I can still slide it in my pocket and it stays clean even though I have the light color (torquoise). I love it and will never again try to use anything but an otter box.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon E Dockery

customer_reviews.title: Its good quality, really nice color
customer_reviews.text: My teenager loves this case. Its good quality, really nice color, good fit, and her phone feels safe. Would order again!
customer_reviews.author: Beginner

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Slim!
customer_reviews.text: I love these cases! They aren't bulky but pretty slim compared to other shock proof cases. They fit in my skinny jeans pocket seamlessly so that should say something. They are also durable! I have dropped my phone more than a few times while having this case and not a scratch on the phone! The plastic part finally gave in the other day but it only crack towards the bottom. Even though it cracked I still am giving it 5 stars because it fell from the second floor of an apartment complex, down the stairs and that was the only damage to my case and phone.
customer_reviews.author: SDC

customer_reviews.title: I love my OtterBox case
customer_reviews.text: I love my OtterBox case. I drop my phone on a hard surface at least once a day and this has saved me many a broken screen I am sure. It definitely makes the phone bulkier and no where as sleek as if it wasn't in a case but that's a compromise I'm willing to make for a safe phone. I also love this turquoise color but of course that is a matter of personal preference. Looks the same as in the photo.
customer_reviews.author: E. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend this case I bought this thinking that it would be a cute protective case but I had it on and dropped my phone (not even a two foot drop) and my phone was and still is shattered horrible I am very disappointed I strongly advise you to stick to life proof
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love the color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, great case! Light and easy to take off and put on. I've dropped my phone a number of times and it hasn't broken. Please keep in mind this does not have a built in screen protector. They are indeed kind enough to give you a screen protector.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Weller

customer_reviews.title: This case is the best in the otterbox series
customer_reviews.text: This case is the best in the otterbox series. It is made of plastic so it slides instead of grips and it is thinner than the other otterbox cases. I have literally shut my phone in the tailgate of my car, and my phone came out unscathed!! My car on the other hand has a dent from the impact!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mask

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone case and the color I was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone case and the color I was a litter nervous about it because o looked at the reviews AFTER I already ordered and was surprised by how many negative comments there were about the fit of the case itself. I received my case today and I must say it is beautifully colored and appears to provide strong protection for my 6s. The only flaw is really just the fit (that everyone is talking about) but in reality it's not even bad and the case still gets the job done plus the gap is hardly noticeable. Definitely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: austin banuelos

customer_reviews.title: would have been great if screen cover was better
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked this phone case just fine if the screen cover was better. it's flimsy and doesn't stay in place. the case itself is great, but the screen cover is junk. it also has a film where the sticky part is.
customer_reviews.author: MScarp

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This is the best iPhone case for the money. Doesn't mess with the usability at all and is very sturdy. I've purchased around 5 of them. Usually last a couple years and everyone in my family uses them!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Thatcher

customer_reviews.title: Gaps/Spaces
customer_reviews.text: So I read the reviews about the gaps/spaces and I decided to go for it because it doesn't seem like that big of a deal...I just got the case & mine has the same issues but it's not too bad but it does bug me a little. This case feels so much better in in my hand than the Otterbox Defender I got before so if you're debating I would go with this one because both of them have some issues lol! I love this case though & it came with a screen protector too which is really nice!
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie

customer_reviews.title: Over time it has cracked in several places and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Over time it has cracked in several places and it doesn't fit exactly. If I have my phone in my jeans back pocket and I pull it out, sometimes the cover will have started to pull off the top of the phone. Not what I expected from an OtterBox.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Gigante

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case works! Protects my phone while I have access to all the buttons with ease and can plug in my headphones (even non-Apple ones) thanks to the flap that opens up, giving more room if needed. I love how I can close both the headphone and charger flap for a polished look that keeps both ports clean and tucked away when not in use. This case is also not very bulky, allowing me to carry my phone pretty normally. I like the two components, a rubber in the inside and the hard plastic on the outside for protection. Also, I love that the home button is free of the case for easier access to it. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. She loves the color and it’s very protective so I don’t have to worry about her dropping it.
customer_reviews.author: L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, strong and nice to hold
customer_reviews.text: Product was perfect, durable and great for my phone to last for ever
customer_reviews.author: Marcela

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good case
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good case, has kept my phone safe but has a small crack at the bottom. Doesn't affect the performance but is a little annoying. I like this better than the defender series since it's easier for me to hold in my smaller hands and slides easily into my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: MomtherOfDragons

customer_reviews.title: Great if you're clumsy with your phone
customer_reviews.text: Great case, and really cute too! I've had this for just about a year now and its held up wonderfully. This case doesn't add a lot of bulk to your phone, but has saved mine from more than a few close calls and only has a few minor scratches to show for it. I would definitely repurchase this case, and would encourage others to purchase it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Looks Nice, but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Great phone protector but the texture of the box causes me to not have a good grip of the phone. Slides around on surfaces and cannot put on arm rest or dash of my car. But the irony is that when it does fall or slip out of my hands, it's protected and very safe.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna82

customer_reviews.title: Cell phone
customer_reviews.text: All my phones have had an otter box and this is a great peoduct
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job-don't really love it like the defender series bc the back is ...
customer_reviews.text: Does the job-don't really love it like the defender series bc the back is plastic and smooth which makes it difficult to hold onto
customer_reviews.author: Astrongarm84

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I got this during Prime Day, and I'm glad I did. Otterbox is known to really protect the phone. This commuter case is more lightweight than the defender. Spend them $20 & save your phone forever! I can’t even tell you how many times I’ve dropped this.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Co

product_meta.title: OtterBox COMMUTER SERIES iPhone 6/6s Case - Frustration Free Packaging - AQUA SKY (AQUA BLUE/LIGHT TEAL)
product_meta.description: You don’t have time to precision pack your briefcase. So, pack along the sleep, slim Commuter Series case — easily fits any crevice in your bag. Featuring a tough two-layer construction, Commuter Series helps keep your phone safe from drops, bumps and life on the go. Plus port plugs stop dust from entering jacks and inputs, so your phone stays clean. Synthetic rubber internal slipcover
feature_bullets: Does not come with a screen protector
Thin, lightweight 2-piece case provides protection against drops, bumps and shock (port covers block entry of dust and debris).
Slides easily in and out of pockets.
Includes Otter Box limited lifetime (see website for details) and 100% authentic.
Thin, lightweight 2-piece case provides protection against drops, bumps and shock (port covers block entry of dust and debris).
Self-adhesive screen protector, guards against scratches.
Slides easily in and out of pockets.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,640 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: Iphone 6/6S Case, Otterbox Certified Drop+ Protection, Installation Instructions, 1-Year Warranty + 100% Authentic
